text: Morning Advertiser is a British trade magazine. In 2011, William Reed Business Media, bought The Publican from United Business Media and merged these two titles to The Publican's Morning Advertiser. About Us: 21st Century: 2011, William Reed Business Media corporate website, Undated . Later, in 2016, it was renamed to the Morning Advertiser. The magazine was first published in 1794 in London. ==References== Category:Magazines of the United Kingdom
title: Morning Advertiser
